alert.note: Alert for Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; Humboldt County - Quinn; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80 (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 27 at 2:46PM PDT until August 27 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 437, 438, 469, AND 470... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 437 Humboldt County-Quinn, Fire Weather Zone 438 W Elko County, N Eureka and Lander Counties N of I80, Fire Weather Zone 469 Central Elko County and Fire Weather Zone 470 Eastern Elko County. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; Humboldt County - Quinn; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80
